Package components

Class StandardTruck

java.lang.Object
components.Truck
components.StandardTruck
All Implemented Interfaces:
Node, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Runnable
public class StandardTruck
extends Truck
Vehicle for transporting packages from the sorting center to the branches and back. All vehicles of this type are in the sorting center.
Version:
2.00 11 juni 2021
Author:
Israel Avihail 308298363, Ofir Golan 315585323
See Also:
Truck, Serialized Form
